item.title: Tensor Network Quantum Virtual Machine
item.description: Install the TNQVM Show installation with and without exatn. note XACC_DIR is different based on brew, apt-get, and custom installs. Show how to set a XACC_DIR environment variable first and pass to cmake Using TNQVM Show with xacc alone, show with qcor at c++ and python jit level
